title: Please I.D. this script font
content:
Hello - I have been searching all morning to try and ID this script with no luck. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181305/http:/typophile.com/files/font_23.jpg) | 78.01 KB |

 [‹ Interior Design magazine font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181305/http:/typophile.com/node/17070 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please identify FAO SCHWARZ LOGO FONT ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181305/http:/typophile.com/node/17060 "Go to next forum topic")
author: laurabachman

comments.content:
I think this is one of the David Rakowski fonts, called Adine Kirnberg. [edit: available as freeware all over the web]

- Mike Yanega

For those with historical interest, this was a Bauer & Co typeface from the Art Nouveau era called ’Schreibschrift Romana’, as shown in Ludwig Petzendorfer’s “Treasury of Authentic Art Nouveau Alphabets”, published by Dover Books.

- Mike Yanega
